description: This snack is full of chilli crunch. Perfect for sharing with friends.
name: Nachos with Plant Based Mince & Vegan Cheese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
400g mixed beans, store bought tin, drained
1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Add one tablespoon canola oil to a heated pan. Add plant based mince and fry for 5 minutes or until it starts to brown. Remove the mince from the pan and set to one side. Now add the garlic, chilli and white onion to the pan with another tablespoon of canola oil and fry for 4 minutes.

Add the drained beans, vegetable stock and passata to the pan, low the heat and allow to simmer and reduce while stirring for 15 minutes. While this is simmering, prepare your salsa by finely chopping all ingredients and adding to a bowl to one side.
Warm the nacho chips in a 140Â°C pre-heated oven for 5 minutes. Now layer the nacho chips with cheese and mince and serve with salsa and a choice of condiments.
